title: Vaibhavam Pancha Layam Haaram: A Symphony of Tradition and Sparkle
materials: featuring premium quality Burmese Rubies (9.60ct - 8 stones)
and lustrous South Sea Pearls (48.45ct - 20 stones). Locket details: Diamond weight-1.49(474)
features: This exquisite Pancha Layam (five-layered) Haaram showcases intricate floral motifs throughout, meticulously set with glittering diamonds, vibrant rubies, and lush emeralds. The central pendant is a masterpiece of nakshi work, featuring a large, captivating emerald centerpiece. Delicate pearl drops adorn each layer, adding a touch of classic elegance. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's rich luster, creating a timeless appeal.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant splashes of ruby red and emerald green
complemented by the soft ivory of the South Sea Pearls. The diamonds add a brilliant white sparkle
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Muhurtham)
and formal galas. A statement piece that commands attention and elevates any ensemble.
description: This Haaram is a testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage, blending traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design. The combination of premium gemstones, intricate nakshi detailing, and the auspicious Pancha Layam design makes it a valuable heirloom piece. Its durability ensures it can be cherished for generations.
